title: Rust Will Explode, SBOMs Will Be Duds: Open Source Predictions
author: Dan Lorenc
description: Rust, jj and uv highlight ongoing innovation in the community, while SBOMs, fair source and server-side Wasm remind us that not every trend will pan out.
cntitle: Rust将爆发，SBOM将成为哑弹：开源预测
cndescription: Rust、jj 和 uv 凸显了社区持续的创新，而 SBOM、公平源代码和服务器端 Wasm 则提醒我们，并非所有趋势都能成功。
